mapper.select: select * from shop_sale_succeed_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all'
select * from shop_province_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all' order by sale_succeed_money desc limit 15
select province_name from shop_province_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all' group by province_name

select shop_id, sum(sale_succeed_money) as sale_succeed_money, sum(succeed_orders_number) as succeed_orders_number, sum(sale_succeed_number) as sale_succeed_number, sum(sale_user_number) as sale_user_number from successful_transaction where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} group by shop_id
select * from shop_refund_info where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all'
select * from shop_refund_reason where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all' order by refund_reason_number desc
select * from shop_refund_sku where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all' order by refund_reason_number desc
select * from shop_client_analysis where shop_id = #{shopId} and dt = #{dt} and order_type = 'all'
